text: Lisa Pauwels (born 27 May 1997) is a Belgian korfball player. She is a member of and the Belgium national korfball team. Pauwels became with her club Floriant 2022 Topkorfbal League champion, after beating in the final Borgerhout/GW. Her brother Glenn Pauwels and sister Amy Pauwels played in this final for Borgerhout/GW. Pauwels became 2022 . With the national team she won the silver medal at the 2022 World Games in Birmingham, Alabama. Pauwels started playing korfball at the age of four. Next to playing korfball she is a kindergarten teacher. ==Achievements== ===Club=== *Topkorfbal League champion (indoor), 1x (2022) *, 1x (2022) ===National team=== ; World Games : 2022 World Games ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian korfball players Category:Sportswomen
title: Lisa Pauwels
